target_paper.title: Patel et al. 2023
target_paper.objective_summary: The main research objective of Patel et al. (2023) is to evaluate the influence of copper and iron-based nanoparticles on methanotroph growth and methanol production from simulated biogas. The study employs a polymeric-matrix-based encapsulation system using NP-derived inoculums to enhance methanol production. The results show significant improvements in methanol production for Methyloferula stellata and Methylocystis bryophila free-cells-based bioconversion.
